metadata.title: CVE-2017-5414 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The file picker dialog can choose and display the wrong local defaultdirectory when instantiated. On some operating systems, this can lead toinformation disclosure, such as the operating system or the local accountname. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 52 and Thunderbird < 52.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5414` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
